message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That's a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $70 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $90, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  $90 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with. How about $85?
I can see you're still interested, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $85 and $90, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $87.50.
